title: torch.linspace() issue with the 4095th element
body_html:
There seems to be an issue with the 4095th element of a torch.linspace():

import torch

def test():
    length=4100
    step=2
    v=torch.linspace(0,step*(length-1),length)
    print(v[length-10:length])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    test()

Output:

 8180.0000
 8182.0000
 8184.0000
 8186.0000
 8188.0000
 8189.9995
 8192.0000
 8194.0000
 8196.0000
 8198.0000
[torch.FloatTensor of size 10]
